short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily blur confidential information in your Dynamics 365 views and forms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dynamics 365 data blur extension is a tool that allows you to quickly blur sensitive data on your Dynamics 365 views and forms. With just one click, you can obscure fields that contain confidential information making it easy to present your Dynamics 365 application in demos and presentations without compromising privacy or security.
